title: New: C A T H E D R A L S – Want My Love
content: SF duo C A T H E D R A L S were always going to end up on a pretty cool label, so it’s no surprise to hear that they’re set to release their debut EP through Neon Gold later in the year. Improving with every song they release, their third track, Want My Love throws some slick, R&B vibes into the mix, featuring their most confident vocal outing yet. Check it out below, and keep your eyes out for the EP, expected in the summer.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
